adjectives.description: showerproof (comparative more showerproof, superlative most showerproof)

entries.meaning: That does not absorb water during light rainfall.

verbs.description: showerproof (third-person singular simple present showerproofs, present participle showerproofing, simple past and past participle showerproofed)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make resistant to light rainfall.
